rooms.description: This space serves as the entry point with a Scandinavian minimalist design featuring clean lines and neutral colors. The area transitions into an open-plan living area.
features: sliding glass doors leading to balcony

rooms.description: An integrated kitchen with a dining area that complements the living space. The design employs modern Scandinavian aesthetics and efficient storage solutions.
A dedicated area for entertainment and home theater purposes. The room is acoustically treated with ambient lighting and designed to create a cozy yet modern atmosphere.
A small but functional bathroom for guests. Incorporates Scandinavian design with simplicity and functionality.

openings.description: A modern, minimalist entrance door with integrated sidelight windows that ensure adequate natural lighting in the entryway.
Access doors to the balconies adjacent to each bedroom on upper floors are integrated into the living area for seamless outdoor access.

common_features.description: A small inner courtyard that brings in natural light and serves as a transitional space between the interior and exterior, adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

notes: The design incorporates Scandinavian minimalism with functional layouts ensuring adequate natural light and open spaces.
Each bedroom on upper levels features a spacious balcony as per the request, ensuring personal outdoor space for occupants.
